text: ai logo! hamanen tumhen ek purush aur ek stree se paida kiya aur tumhen biraadariyon aur qabilon ka roop diya, taaki tum ek-doosare ko pahachaano. vaastav mein allaah ke yahaan tumamen sabase adhik pratishthit vah hai, jo tumame sabase adhik dar rakhata hai. nishchay hee allaah sabakuchh jaananevaala, khabar rakhanevaala hai
